column4: Hey all. I have a sound related problem.  It's not a big one, just a bit of a pain in the ass.  My sound level control seems to be whacked.  At 65% it is as whisper, at 50% it is completly silent (this is with my speakers cranked up fairly high). Can anyone shed some light on what's wrong?
is this just Master?  PCM might be low.
i think this is just master. it's the speaker in the top panel. how would i check PCM?
no, i double clicked on it. and pcm is at about 80%
